DefiningCitation: Chou J.C.Y. & InterSePT Study Group. (2003). The InterSePT scale for suicidal thinking reliability and validity. Schizophrenia Research
InterSePT Scale for Suicidal Thinking.Definition: The InterSePT Scale for Suicidal Thinking (ISST) is an assessment of current suicidal ideation in patients with schizophrenia and schizoaffective disorders.
